themes: over-reliance on tourism metrics in funding
focus on local communities vs. tourists
key_phrases: the arts are not always accessible to me
more arts organizations and artists to be required to learn about how to make their events/programs more accessible
I'm also working class, a person of color, and a queer person
providing training in these realms would be great
for all city grants we have to track tourists
I make programs for locals, and that should be fine
barriers_identified: lack of accessibility for disabled people
insufficient inclusivity for working class, people of color, and queer individuals
requirement to track tourists for city grants
solutions_proposed: require more arts organizations and artists to learn about accessibility
provide training on accessibility, class, race, and queer inclusion for artists and arts organizations
allow programs focused on locals to be eligible for city grants without tracking tourists
